name: NX Portfolio Slider
author: NewEx

sections.description:
Showcase your client project with Portfolio Slider!
This simple and easy user friendly plugin will allow you to show your portfolio or project slider without any extra effort!

ðŸ‘‰ Official Demo Link: Official Demo
ðŸ‘‰ Docs Link: Documentation
ðŸ‘‰ Feature Suggestion/Issue Track: GitHub

Core Features-

  • Portfolio Slider
  1. Create unlimited slider
  2. Display slider by category wise
  • How to use
  1. Navigate to NX Portfolio Slider menu > Slider Settings and copy shortcode
  2. Paste the shortcode on any page and done!
  • Fully compatible with Elementor, Gutenberg, Classic Editor.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder after extracting it to the “/wp-content/plugins/(the folder of the extracted plugin)” directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Now navigate to NX Portfolio Slider > Slider Settings menu and copy shortcode
  4. Paste the shortcode on any page and done!
sections.faq:
Is this free?

Yes, this is free!

Does it work with Gutenberg?

Yes, it does.

Can I ask or request for new feature?

Yes, you can! Request here-GitHub
